short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Riverbed BrowserMetrix plugin monitors web page performance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin works with Riverbed BrowserMetrix to monitor web page performance.

A free trial of BrowserMetrix is available at: http://appresponse.opnet.com.
